## Nationwide Children’s Hospital [Columbus, OH]

**BMT4Me: Post-HSCT Medication Adherence mHealth App**

K-funded project exploring the feasibility and acceptability of a mobile health (mHealth) application through user testing and thematic content analysis in primary caregivers and health care providers of children discharged during the acute phase (first 100 days) post-hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT).

**An exploration of COVID-19 impacts and Vaccine hesitancy in parents of hematopoietic stem cell transplant recipients**

Cross-sectional study investigating the impacts of COVID-19 and COVID-19 vaccine hesitancy among parents with children who have undergone hematopoietic stem cell transplant.

**Cabozantinib Patient Reported Outcomes J&J Care Symptom App: Reactions to a New App to Monitor Symptoms in Children with Cancer**

Multi-site longitudinal study investigating the quality of life in patients aged between 5-40 years following administration of and maintenance with the drug cabozantinib.

**Twice daily i.v. bolus tacrolimus infusion for Graft versus Host disease prophylaxis in children undergoing stem cell transplant**

Cross-sectional Study investigating the efficacy of administering twice bolus tacrolimus infusion in allogenic hematopoietic stem cell transplant children under 18 years.

**A retrospective comparison of tacrolimus intrapatient variability measures and outcomes in pediatric hematopoietic stem cell transplant patients**

Cross-sectional Study investigating the efficacy of administering twice bolus tacrolimus infusion in allogenic hematopoietic stem cell transplant children under 18 years.

**J&J Care Symptom App: Reactions to a New App to Monitor Symptoms in Children with Cancer**

Pilot study investigating the feasibility and acceptability of a symptom application through user testing and thematic content analysis in children with cancer.

**ATR (Allocation of Treatment Responsibility)**

K-funded project exploring the feasibility and acceptability of a mobile health (mHealth) application through user testing and thematic content analysis in primary caregivers and health care providers of children discharged during the acute phase (first 100 days) post-hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HSCT) and in the outpatient hematology/oncology clinic.

**Who’s It? Understanding Allocation of Treatment Responsibility in Adolescent and Emerging Young Adult Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant Patients**

Pilot study examining the associations between allocation of treatment responsibility (ATR) and adherence among adolescent and emerging adult (AEA) hematopoietic stem cell transplant (HCT) recipients and primary caregiver dyads in the acute outpatient phase post-HCT (i.e., first 3 months post-discharge).

**DAISY study: Exploration of Adherence in Pediatric HSCT**

Pilot study to explore COVID-19 exposure, impact, distress, access to care, and vaccine hesitancy among parents of children with cancer during the pandemic

**COVID Kids Study: An exploration of school children experiences with the COVID- 19 pandemic**

Pilot longitudinal study among school-aged children and their parents to examine family communication and children’s social and emotional experiences during the COVID-19 pandemic

**COVID and Cancer Kids Study: An exploration of experiences with the COVID-19 pandemic in parents of children with cancer**

Pilot survey study to explore COVID-19 exposure, impact, distress, access to care, and vaccine hesitancy among parents of children with cancer during the pandemic.

Proportion of patients discharged from Southwest General with anticoagulation starter packs in hand Weighted-Incidence antibiograms creation, validation, and implementation Pilot studies done under the pharmacy and emergency departments to collect data from medical records on antibiotics prescription for urinary infections and anticoagulation prescriptions

## Kent State University [Kent, OH]

**Africa is Different from Here**

A Qualitative Exploration of Newly Resettled Congolese Refugee Women in the United States Qualitative studies conducted to gather information about experiences of Newly Resettled Congolese Refugee Women in the state of Ohio, United States

## Prevention Research Centre for Healthy Neighborhood [Cleveland, OH]

**Exploring mental health needs among Hispanic youth**

Pilot study to explore mental health needs among the LatinX/Hispanic community in the Cleveland area

## University of the West of England [Bristol, United Kingdom]

**Experiences of International Students at the UWE (University of the West of England) Experiences of the Black and Minority Ethnic community at UWE**

Studies conducted with the minority groups and international students at UWE to gain information on their experiences on UWE campus

**Use of mobile technologies for public health interventions in low- and middle- income countries**

Initiated a pilot study for conducting a systematic review on the use of mobile technologies for public health interventions in low- and middle- income countries

**Facts4Life**

NHS Gloucestershire Integrated Care Board funded Health resilience and preventative program for pre-school, primary and secondary settings (including parents) that provides opportunities to learn more about physical and mental health as a commitment to changing children and families’ attitudes to health and illness over time in Gloucestershire County.
